thread.title: New York Republicans, Democrats Split on Response to Florida School Shootings

author: Joseph De Avila
title: New York Republicans, Democrats Split on Response to Florida School Shootings
text:
New York state lawmakers have split along party lines in their responses to the deadly Florida school shooting, with Democrats calling for tighter gun laws and Republicans focusing on improving schoolsâ€™ security.
Republicans back legislation to provide enhanced scanner technology that can detect firearms in schools, as well as another proposal to station police officers at every New York City school.
Democrats,...
